org.hibernate.mapping

Interface Fetchable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Array, Bag, Collection, IdentifierBag, IdentifierCollection, IndexedCollection, List, ManyToOne, Map, OneToOne, PrimitiveArray, Set, ToOne
